item.title: About Lena
item.description: I am a web developer and scrum master working in the financial & automotive sector. While I work very ‘full-stack’, my real love is frontend. Especially frontend frameworks / libraries as they increase overall development speed and brand conformity. I will always defend and fight for them. I’m fairly experienced when it comes to React and I actually love TypeScript. Books I’m a reader, through-and-through. It’s in my blood - I didn’t know that it was possible for parents not to always have a book around until fairly recently.
